name: Eisenbahn-Compagnie mit begrenzter Haftung
description:
Explore the German landscape and construct a sprawling network of trains to exploit its natural resources. Fire up your engines and dive into the gold-rush of 19th century german industrialization.

(This Game is largely unfinished and more of a Prototype. It is missing Textures and Sounds and is largely unbalanced.)

HOW TO PLAY:

- Connect Stations to create Trainlines.

- Use your Resources wisely to construct Production Facilities at these Stations.

- Resources are generated when a Train stops at a Station.

The Map of Germany is generated with real Data. All locations (Stations) are based of real places. Because of the large amount of Data being processed starting the Game can take a little bit of time.
